name: Quetext
description: Quetext is a plagiarism detection and writing assistant platform that ensures content originality and enhances writing quality for students, educators, and professionals.
longDescription: Quetext is an advanced online platform designed to detect plagiarism and support original writing through AI-powered tools. Its proprietary DeepSearch™ technology scans billions of sources to identify exact and near matches, helping users maintain academic and professional integrity. The platform also offers writing assistance features like paraphrasing and citation generation to streamline content creation. Founded by a team led by Tom Bres, Quetext serves over 5 million users worldwide, including students, teachers, and professionals. It aims to simplify plagiarism detection and improve writing quality with user-friendly, reliable tools. The service is particularly valuable for educational institutions and content creators seeking to ensure originality and proper citation.
features: DeepSearch™ technology scans billions of documents to detect exact and fuzzy matches for comprehensive plagiarism checking.
AITutorMe paraphrasing tool provides three high-quality rephrasing options to enhance original content creation.
The citation generator creates accurate citations from website URLs, ensuring proper credit and professional formatting.
ColorGrade™ feedback highlights plagiarized sections with color-coded reports for easy identification and correction.
The AI content detector identifies text generated by AI platforms like ChatGPT or Gemini, ensuring content authenticity.
Bulk file uploads allow users to check up to 20 documents simultaneously, improving efficiency for large projects.
Integration with Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive enables seamless file uploads for plagiarism checks.
Downloadable originality reports provide detailed insights into plagiarism matches and sources for user reference.
URL/domain exclusion allows users to customize scans by excluding specific sources, enhancing accuracy.
Grammar and spell check tools improve writing quality alongside plagiarism detection.
The subscription pause feature lets users pause monthly subscriptions for 1-3 months, offering flexibility for academic users.

faqs.question: What is Quetext used for?
faqs.answer: Quetext is a plagiarism detection and writing assistant tool that helps users ensure content originality and improve writing through AI-powered features like DeepSearch™ and citation generation.

faqs.question: Does Quetext offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quetext provides a free plan that includes plagiarism checks for up to 500 words and AI detection for up to 250 words, with limited features compared to paid plans.

faqs.question: How accurate is Quetext’s plagiarism detection?
faqs.answer: Quetext’s DeepSearch™ technology is highly accurate, scanning billions of sources to detect exact and rephrased matches, with over 95% of users in a 2025 study finding it more accurate than competitors.

faqs.question: Can Quetext detect AI-generated content?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quetext’s AI detector identifies text generated by platforms like ChatGPT and Gemini, helping users ensure content is human-written.

faqs.question: What types of users benefit from Quetext?
faqs.answer: Quetext is designed for students, educators, writers, bloggers, and professionals who need to verify content originality and enhance writing quality.

faqs.question: How does the AITutorMe paraphrasing tool work?
faqs.answer: AITutorMe provides three rephrasing options for selected text, allowing users to customize tone, style, or wording to create original content efficiently.

faqs.question: Can Quetext integrate with cloud storage?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quetext supports file uploads from Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive, making it easy to check documents stored in the cloud.

faqs.question: What is the ColorGrade™ feedback feature?
faqs.answer: ColorGrade™ highlights plagiarized sections in color-coded reports, showing matches and sources side-by-side for easy editing or citation.

faqs.question: Is Quetext suitable for educational institutions?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quetext offers tools tailored for schools and universities, including admin controls and features to promote academic integrity.
